title: SeismicFault
description: A representation of a single fault picked on the basis of seismic data. The record carries information about the seismic geometry context. It can be part of an UnsealedSurfaceFramework.

SeismicPickingTypeID.title: Seismic Picking Type ID
SeismicPickingTypeID.description: Method used to pick faults. E.g.Autotracked, Grid, Manual Picked

Remark.title: Remark
Remark.description: Optional comment to capture interpreter thoughts.  Distinguished from Description which is a general explanation of the object.

SeismicDomainTypeID.title: Seismic Domain Type ID
SeismicDomainTypeID.description: Vertical domain of faults.  E.g. Time, Depth

BinGridID.title: Bin Grid ID
BinGridID.description: the Bin Grid of the Fault System when coordinates are specified in seismic bin inline/crossline.

SeismicLineGeometryIDs.title: Seismic Line Geometry IDs
SeismicLineGeometryIDs.description: The list of explicit 2D seismic line geometries overriding any definitions inferred from Seismic2DInterpretationSet. If empty and Seismic2DInterpretationSetID is populated, Seismic2DInterpretationSet.SeismicLineGeometries[].SeismicLineGeometryID apply.

VerticalDatumOffset.title: Vertical Datum Offset
VerticalDatumOffset.description: Datum value, the elevation of zero time/depth on the vertical axis in the domain of seismicdomaintype relative to the vertical reference datum used (usually MSL). Positive is upward from zero elevation to seismic datum).

VerticalMeasurementTypeID.title: Vertical Measurement Type ID
VerticalMeasurementTypeID.description: Identifies a vertical reference datum type. E.g. mean sea level, ground level, mudline.

ReplacementVelocity.title: Replacement Velocity
ReplacementVelocity.description: Value used to produce vertical static shifts in data.

SeismicFaultTypeID.title: Seismic Fault Type ID
SeismicFaultTypeID.description: Geological type of fault geometry. E.g. Thrust (thr), Reverse (rev), Normal(norm)

SeismicFaultLength.title: Seismic Fault Length
SeismicFaultLength.description: Maximum linear dimension measured along strike of the slip surface

SeismicFaultSurfaceArea.title: Seismic Fault Surface Area
SeismicFaultSurfaceArea.description: Surface Area of the Fault Plane

FaultHeaveNumber.title: Fault Heave Number
FaultHeaveNumber.description: Maximum stratigraphic heave, the apparent horizontal component of the net-slip.

StratigraphicFaultOffset.title: Stratigraphic Fault Offset
StratigraphicFaultOffset.description: Maximum vertical offset of faulted strata.

Interpreter.title: Interpreter
Interpreter.description: The person or team who interpreted the fault data.

Role.title: Representation Role
Role.description: The RepresentationRole assigned to this SeismicFault. Examples: FaultSticks, Pick, FaultCenterLine.

Type.title: Representation Type
Type.description: The FaultSystem RepresentationType assigned to this SeismicFault. Examples: PolylineSet, TriangulatedSurface.
